sentences.en: Don't just blindly follow what the banker says.
sentences.cn: 不要盲目听信银行家的话。

sentences.en: He felt keenly that the banker ought to be shaken out.
sentences.cn: 他深以为这位银行家必须排挤出去.

sentences.en: He was until very recently the most powerful banker in the city.
sentences.cn: 到最近为止，他一直都是这个城市最有实力的银行家。

sentences.en: It made sense to appoint a banker to this job.
sentences.cn: 指派一位银行家做这份工作是明智之举。

sentences.en: Let him be the banker this time.
Letter of credit belongs to banker's credit.
The banker chuckled and said, "Of course not."
sentences.cn: 银行家暗自发笑并说道：“当然不。”

sentences.en: The banker keeps the money tucked safely under his bed.
sentences.cn: 这位银行家为保险起见将钱塞在床下。

sentences.en: The banker produced a proposed agenda.
sentences.cn: 银行家取出一分拟就的议程.

sentences.en: The banker was laughing at his simplicity.
sentences.cn: 银行家被他的直率逗笑了.

sentences.en: The banker's speech was fluent, but it was also copious.
sentences.cn: 银行家的话滔滔不绝, 但也烦琐冗杂.

sentences.en: The suit was faultless: Wood guessed that he was a very successful publisher or a banker.
sentences.cn: 西装无可挑剔：伍德推测他可能是个相当成功的出版商或银行家。

sentences.en: We consult a banker about our money.
sentences.cn: 我们向银行家询问我们的资金情况.

sentences.en: You pay for the car by banker's draft in the local currency.
sentences.cn: 以本币银行汇票支付车款。

words.tran_cn: 银行业；银行业务；银行家的职业；筑堤
把钱存入银行；做银行家；在…边筑堤（bank的现在分词）
[金融]银行家；银行业者；掘土工

trans.tran_en: someone who works in a bank in an important position
